official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a minimum adjustment to payments to hospitals under the Medicare Program for costs attributable to wages.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to establish a minimum wage index for Medicare payments to hospitals for costs attributable to wages.
